- Determine timing and spatial extent of post-spawning movements
- Determine annual survival and spawning site fidelity
- Determine timing of movement onto spawning grounds

class: top, center

# Survival (at least 6 months)
.left[
- 2018 autumn- .red[84%] survival (4 dead, 25 tagged)
- 2019 autumn- .red[94%] survival (3 dead, 51 tagged)
- 2020 winter- .red[8%] survival (36 dead, 39 tagged)
- 2020 autumn- .red[87%] survival (9 dead, 69 tagged)
]

<center>
<img src="../docs/abacus_ex.png", width="30%" height="30%"/>
</center>

---

class: top, center

# Conclusions
.left[
- Extensive movements, movements to Lake Huron in summer/autumn
- Overwinter in islands
- Depth range: 0-30 m
  - less than 20 m November to April
  - some greater than 20 m May to October
- Temperature range: 0-20 C
- Survival
  - winter tagging and/or gill nets is .red[BAD]
  - survival > 84% during autumn
]
